trails.name: Yongma Mountain
trails.description: Yongma Mountain is a small mountain located in the eastern part of Seoul. It is a popular hiking destination for locals and tourists alike. The mountain offers a variety of hiking trails that cater to all skill levels, from beginners to experienced hikers. The mountain is also home to a number of temples and shrines, making it a great place to explore Korean culture and history. The mountain is easily accessible by public transportation, making it a convenient destination for a day trip from Seoul.
